TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項之 、、 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別用於， ， ，並方法，以提供存取輸出參數、 傳回值，以及所呼叫的方法所擲回的例外狀況控制項。The class is used in the , , , and methods to provide access to output parameters, return values, and exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control. 這些供， ，和屬性，分別。These are accessed by the , , and properties, respectively. 藉由新增委派以處理， ， ，或事件，您可以檢查這項資料，並執行所需的任何其他的後續處理。By adding a delegate to handle the , , , or events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing that is required. 控制項會公開許多您可以使用基礎的商務物件在其生命週期中的不同時間處理的事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出的事件，以及相關聯類別和事件處理常式委派。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |Event - 事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|事件處理常式EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

只有在建立商務物件的執行個體之前立即發生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

建立商務物件的執行個體之後立即發生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

在擷取資料之前發生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

執行插入、 更新或刪除作業之前發生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |。.

在擷取資料之後，就會發生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

插入、 更新或刪除作業完成之後，就會發生。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在商務物件被終結之前發生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例會使用範例中介層商務物件。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示所有員工，使用的方法，由一組屬性以從中擷取資料`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`，則控制項自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，使用所指定的方法來執行動作屬性和任何參數中指定集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此範例中，有一個參數指定於集合對應至員工識別碼。In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the employee ID. 這是因為雖然識別碼包含在做為集合物件，它將會以字串的形式傳遞控制項。This is because although the ID is included in the collection as a object, it will be passed as a string to the control. 藉由明確地將它加入集合屬性設定為的值，就會傳遞正確為整數，而不是字串的方法。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property set to the value, it will pass correctly by the to the method as an integer, rather than as string. 在此範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行動作，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的動作完成後，以處理任何可能發生的例外狀況。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to handle any exceptions that might have occurred. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派存取可能所使用的商務物件擲回的例外狀況物件。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate accesses possible exceptions that are thrown by the business object that is using the object. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由處理這個委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例使用的範例中介層商務物件。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 下列清單描述在程式碼範例中所定義的兩個主要類別：The following list describes the two major classes that are defined in the code example: - `EmployeeLogic`類別是不會維護狀態，並封裝商務邏輯的類別。The `EmployeeLogic` class is a class that does not maintain state and encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`類別是包含只載入和保存資料層中的資料所需的基本功能的模型類別。The `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 颾魤 ㄛ`NorthwindDataException`類別為了方便起見提供。In addition, a `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 這組範例類別會使用 Northwind Traders 資料庫，這是適用於 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 範例資料庫。This set of example classes uses the Northwind Traders database, which is an example database that is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 如需完整的實用範例，您必須編譯為程式庫，此程式碼，然後使用 從 ASP 頁面這些類別。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. 在上述範例中提供的 ASP 網頁會設定為使用此類別庫。The ASP page that is provided in the preceding example is configured to work with this class library. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全實作，因此您會將資料插入 Northwind Traders 資料庫時您試驗此範例。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `returnValue`參數可以是任何商務物件資料方法的呼叫所傳回的物件。The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method. `outputParameters`參數是符合那些在方法簽章和傳址方式傳遞的名稱/值組的集合。The `outputParameters` parameter is an collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.

summary.span: 使用指定的輸出參數、傳回值和例外狀況，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified output parameters, return value, and exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `returnValue`參數可以是任何商務物件資料方法的呼叫所傳回的物件。The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method. `outputParameters`參數是符合那些在方法簽章和傳址方式傳遞的名稱/值組的集合。The `outputParameters` parameter is an collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference. `exception`參數是包裝所呼叫的方法所擲回任何例外狀況的例外狀況資料作業期間控制。The `exception` parameter is an exception that wraps any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control during a data operation. 如果未處理例外狀況， ， ，或方法，它就會擲回控制傳回的資料作業之後。If the exception is not handled by an , , , or method, it is thrown by the control after the data operation returns.

value.span: 受到資料作業影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用值來確認預期的資料列數目，已受到影響。Use the value to verify that the expected number of rows was affected.

public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得在資料作業期間由 控制項呼叫的方法所擲回之任何例外狀況的包裝函式。

span.span: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control during a data operation.

value.span: ，包裝商務物件在其 中擲回的任何例外狀況。

span.span: An that wraps any exceptions thrown by the business object in its .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例外狀況並不代表實際的商務物件資料的方法所擲回的例外狀況。The exception does not represent the actual exception that is thrown by the business object data method. 您可以使用屬性來存取擲回的例外狀況。You can use the property to access the thrown exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示所有員工，使用的方法，由一組屬性以從中擷取資料`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`，則控制項自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，使用所指定的方法來執行動作屬性和任何參數中指定集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行動作，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的動作完成後，執行任何例外狀況處理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to perform any exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate. 若要檢查的實作`EmployeeLogic`中間層商務物件，此程式碼範例使用，請參閱中的類別概觀。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否已處理商務物件擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was thrown by the business object has been handled.

value.span: 如果商務物件擲回的例外狀況已經過處理且不應由 擲回，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an exception thrown by the business object has been handled and should not be thrown by the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果商務物件擲回例外狀況，屬性設定為`false`包裝的例外狀況和屬性。If the business object throws an exception, the property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the property. 如果您使用物件，您可以檢查屬性並處理例外狀況。If you use an object, you can check the property and handle the exception. 如果您處理的例外狀況時，設定屬性設`true`或控制項將會擲回例外狀況。If you handle the exception, set the property to `true` or the control will throw an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項使用商務物件和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示所有員工，使用的方法，由一組屬性以從中擷取資料`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`，則控制項自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，使用所指定的方法來執行動作屬性和任何參數中指定集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行動作，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的動作完成後，以處理任何可能發生的例外狀況。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to handle any exceptions that might have occurred. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate. 若要檢查的實作`EmployeeLogic`中間層商務物件，此程式碼範例使用，請參閱中的類別概觀。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得包含商務物件方法參數和其值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.

value.span: 名稱/值組的 ，表示商務物件方法參數和其對應的值。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何傳址方式傳遞至商務物件方法的參數中傳回集合。Any parameters that are passed to the business object method by reference are returned in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReturnValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ReturnValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得商務物件方法傳回之做為物件的傳回值 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the return value that is returned by the business object method, if any, as an object.

value.span: 物件，表示商務物件方法傳回的傳回值，如果商務物件方法未傳回值，則為 。

span.span: An object that represents the return value returned by the business object method; otherwise, , if the business object method returns no value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會設定建構函式。The property is set in the constructor. 此值設為使用反映來呼叫的商務物件方法呼叫的傳回值。The value is set to the return value of the business object method call, which is called using reflection. 如果商務方法未傳回值 (例如商務物件方法傳回時`void`)，則屬性評估為`null`。If the business method returns no value (such as when the business object method returns `void`), the property evaluated to `null`.
